text: Futhi labo abangakholwanga bayolethwa esihogweni beyizixuku kuze kube yilapho befika kusona futhi iyovulwa iminyango yaso futhi bayothi kubona abaqaphi baso “ngakube azifikanga yini kunina izithunywa eziphuma phakathi kwenu zinifundela amavesi eNkosi yenu futhi zinixwayisa ngokuhlangana kwalolusuku lwenu na?” bayothi “yebo” kepha liyogcwaliseka izwi lesijeziso kwabangakholwa
